definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of the secondary phloem of Rhus verniciflua Stokes was studies.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了漆樹莖次生韌皮部各組成分子的超微結構。

sentences.english: The result shows that the photosynthate and the water from xylem transportation in phloem are closely interrelated.
sentences.chinese: 同化物分子和水分子在韌皮部的運輸存在多速率現象。

sentences.english: The secondary phloem consisted of sieve cells and phloem parenchymas.
sentences.chinese: 根的次生韌皮部則由篩胞和韌皮薄壁細胞組成。

sentences.english: In the transection section, the area of secondary phloem is much larger than secondary xylem.
sentences.chinese: 在橫切面上，次生韌皮部的面積比次生木質部大得多。

sentences.english: The first and the second leaf traces are organized in the middle of the primary phloem.
sentences.chinese: 第一和第二片葉子的葉跡則在初生韌皮部中間發生。

sentences.english: There are more developed phloem fiber and many albumin cells surround the phloem.
sentences.chinese: 韌皮部外有發達的韌皮纖維和較多的蛋白細胞。

sentences.english: This had similar mercury levels to the phloem.
sentences.chinese: 樹皮的汞含量與韌皮部相近。

sentences.english: The abortion of companion cell of phloem of anther connective vascular bundle.
sentences.chinese: 藥隔維管束韌皮部的伴胞解體。
